short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: - Legal AI Assistant Artificial Intelligence for Lawyers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experto AI's LAIA extension is a tool for lawyers and legal professionals to streamline their workflow by creating summaries as they do their research. 
Lawyers will have the extension installed and as they conduct their research they will come across cases, open the extension and click the FIRAC button to generate a summary which can then be exported in the form of PDF, Word doc, or Excel. 
Each time they click the FIRAC button it is saved in a "session" which helps organize their research. They can choose the output in different styles (vertical and horizontal tables, or text).
There is also a preview button which runs the API for the lawyer to preview the output before they decide to add it to their session. This helps them to decide whether this is a case they wish to use in their research.
